cause.description:
Although Ohio as a whole has very few Championships to feel good about, things are changing in the best city of this great state, CLEVELAND. Our Tribe, Brownies, and Cavs have all begun their return to glory, and we will be there to PARTY OUR ASSES OFF!!
1. LeBron James is the savior as a whole.
2. Grady Sizemore is the MVP of baseball.
3. K2 might talk a lot, but the man is a beast and must be respected.
4. Lets face the facts, pro athletes get paid way too much, screw it LETS GO CLEVE!!
cause.mission: get everyone excited about the greatest sports town in AMERICA!
cause.name: Cleveland Sports Revolution
